--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill looked back to Redhot, not totally getting the joke, but
> smilling so as not to hurt his friends feelings. "Then maybe we 
should
> put my little story on hold, ans check out our partners." he said,
> transforming into his police car mode, as his trunk opened up. "Will 
you
> still need a lift?" he asked.
> 
> Beachcomber stood up from his study on a alien form of insect, and
> transformed as well. "Yeah, that would be wise Firedrill. Coming 
Klant?"
> he asked.

::REDHOT::

   Redhot smiled, not realizing  Firedrill didn't understood the joke. 
   "I agree with you" he said. "Lets go check out Cliffjumper and 
Klant. They've been gone for far too long." He paused and surveyed his 
surroundings for a momment. He inhaled deeply. "Ahhhhh...the fresh 
air." he said. "C'mon. Lets go." he said to the others and hoped into 
Firedrill's seating arrangement.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
